text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump ATTENTION: Black unemployment is 15.4%, Hispanic unemployment is 14.5% and yesterday U.S. had the highest single day cases of Covid-19 cases in the history of the pandemic with over 50,000.

#CovidTesting 
#VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare
#VoteOutTheGOPCowards
